TextView.android:hint: The company OPAL Marketing and Industry LLC is the official PTAC Master Franchisee in Oman. Since 1995, we've been working as Precision Tune Auto Care, USA's strategic partners. When it comes to our clients, we always go above and beyond to ensure they receive the best possible service and care. The satisfaction of our customers is of the utmost importance to us, and we will stop at nothing to guarantee that they receive our best service

PTACs are service-oriented businesses that focus on satisfying clients who place a premium on speed, affordability, and convenience. We are pleased to announce that, after Omani car dealerships, we are the largest provider of automotive services in the country, with 27 years of expertise in the Market and Culture. At this time, it is being run in the Sultanate of Oman by both company-owned and sub-Franchisee-owned locations. More than 50,000 vehicles per month receive servicing from PTAC's 52 fully functional centers across Oman.

PTAC centres offers automotive after sale services like Quick Oil Change, Service of Brake, Suspensions, Exhaust, Tires, Air Conditioning and complete Electrical checkup, Tune ups, Computer diagnostics and General repairs, Flushing services etc
